param.name: system.ftp.server
param.spec: text description='FTP server address' display='normal' label='FTP server:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.ftp.port
param.spec: text display='normal' label='FTP server port:' regexp='|[0-9|]+' validationMessage='Invalid port number' validationMode='regex'

param.name: system.src.dir
param.spec: text description='Directory with files for upload (if empty - current directory will be used)' display='normal' label='Source directory:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.include.pattern
param.spec: text description='Ant-like include pattern for files in source directory' display='normal' label='Include pattern:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.exclude.pattern
param.spec: text description='Ant-like exclude pattern for files in source directory' display='normal' label='Exclude pattern:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.dest.dir
param.spec: text description='Directory on FTP server where to put files (if empty - default directory for given username will be used)' display='normal' label='Destination directory:' validationMode='any'

parameters.param:
<project name="FTP upload">
<property name="temp" value="${teamcity.build.tempDir}/ftpTemp"/> <condition property="dest.dir.set"> <matches pattern=".+" string="${dest.dir}"/> </condition>
<target name="prepare-ftp"> <mkdir dir="${temp}"/>
<get src="http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/commons-net/commons-net/2.0/commons-net-2.0.jar" dest="${temp}/commons-net-2.0.jar" verbose="true"/>
<get src="http://bit.ly/bdHM3A" dest="${temp}/ant-classloadertask-1.0-RC2.zip" verbose="true"/> <unzip src="${temp}/ant-classloadertask-1.0-RC2.zip" dest="${temp}"> <fileset dir="ant-classloadertask-1.0-RC2" file="ant-classloadertask.jar"/> </unzip>
<!--suppress AntResolveInspection --> <taskdef resource="net/jtools/classloadertask/antlib.xml" classpath="${temp}/ant-classloadertask-1.0-RC2/ant-classloadertask.jar"/> <classloader loader="system" classpath="${temp}/commons-net-2.0.jar"/> <taskdef name="ftp" classname="org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.net.FTP"/> </target>
<target name="put-files" depends="prepare-ftp, create-remote-dir">
<ftp server="${ftp.server}" port="${ftp.port}" userid="${ftp.user}" password="${ftp.password}" remotedir="${dest.dir}" verbose="true">
<fileset dir="${src.dir}"> <include name="${include.pattern}"/> <exclude name="${exclude.pattern}"/> </fileset> </ftp>
</target>
<target name="create-remote-dir" if="dest.dir.set"> <ftp action="mkdir" server="${ftp.server}" port="${ftp.port}" userid="${ftp.user}" password="${ftp.password}" remotedir="${dest.dir}"> </ftp> </target>
</project>
